content.rendered:
“Science and Technology: Impacts on Society in the 21st Century.”

Dr James Martin, author, business leader, and social entrepreneur in the fields of digital technology, education, and international development speaking at the 13th annual Commonwealth Lecture on 28 April 2010.

Click here to for the presentation
